attributes.action: Stop the English FA selling Wembley Stadium, the home of football.
attributes.additional_details: We won the world cup there in '66 on our own turf at the home of football. Don't sell Wembley to someone who does not care about it?
attributes.background:
The English FA need to understand, players want to play @ Wembley sometime in their lives all fans want to watch their team at Wembley. 
Stop having the FA cup semi finals at Wembley & make Wembley sacred again for the finals only. Do not sell Wembley

rejection.details:
Any decision about selling Wembley Stadium is the responsibility of the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact the FA directly about this issue:
http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us

You could start a new petition to ask the UK Government to urge the FA not to sell Wembley Stadium.
